extension.news: 3.4.29 (27-08-2021) - Play trailer from shelf items - Slide out media items when trailer playing - Misc. fixes 3.4.28 (23-08-2021) - Show disc art in list views - Use disc instead of thumb for music in fanart view - Misc. fixes 3.4.27 (20-08-2021) - Make shelf info popup delay configurable - Add back Artwork Beef options - Fixes for music visualization - Misc. fixes 3.4.26 (04-08-2021) - Option to open info dialog from fanart title button - Option to use custom image(s), video or playlist at startup - Option to hide vertical menu when shelves are focused - Misc. fixes 3.4.25 (20-07-2021) - Option to automatically play trailers in media views (only local trailers) - Add option to show information popup for shelves - Add option to center shelf items 3.4.24 (03-07-2021) - Fixes for OSD and seekbar - Add movie decades playlists and widget option 3.4.23 (29-06-2021) - Rework OSD - Option for alternate OSD button highlighting 3.4.22 (25-06-2021) - Fixes for Compact and Ultra Compact OSD 3.4.21 (24-06-2021) - Rework Compact OSD highlighting - Ultra Compact OSD - Misc. fixes 3.4.20 (21-06-2021) - Compact OSD - Misc. fixes
